docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
An overview of what this is for, how to install it, how to use it, for simple cases.

Then an overview of concepts that this project relies on. Principles, terminology, etc.

Maybe a quick overview of some details that may be important to everyday use.

docs.title: Overview
docs.text:
When the CorpusTools are installed through pipx, many commands are available on the command line. These are:

  • convert2xml
  • add_files_to_corpus

docs.title: Overview
docs.text: Convert original files in a corpus to giellatekno/divvun xml format.
